content: --चारिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} studying the Vedas. {2} practising continence or chastity. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} a religious student, a Brāhmaṇa in the first order of his life, who continues to live with his spiritual guide from the investiture with sacred thread and performs the duties pertaining to his order till he settles in life; <ls>Ms. 2. 41</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 2.">175</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">6. 87.</ls> {2} one who vows to lead the life of a celibate. {3} an epithet of Śiva. {4} of Skanda.
